title: Design Walk
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110213041227im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1179151835dsc02944kp1_3604.jpg)

So I just found this poster and had to put it up. It's for a design walk back in 2007 in Russia or Greece. It was created by g in Athens, Greece. This poster is completely handmade! I absolutely love how everything is staged before the final picture is taken.
author: Pin

comments.content:
damn that must have taken forever!

- Scott Sullivan
